article.title: Booz Allen Awarded Contract for Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton is receiving an $11 million modification to a previously awarded cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to exercise an option for technical, engineering, professional and management support services for the Special Communications Requirements Division of the Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division in support of the U.S. Defense Department, Joint Service and Federal Agencies programs.
